adresa: 38 Regina Elisabeta Boulevard,, Sector 5, 050017 Bucharest, Romania
detalii: The architecture of Hotel Cismigiu mixes Art Nouveau with a contemporary style. You will also find here 7 meeting rooms, and an underground parking. The hotel also houses The Cervantes Institute, as well as a bookshop.
With interior of neutral colours and with attentively chosen design touches inspired by the Neo-Romanian architectural style, some units have a french balcony and views of the garden.

In the vicinity you will find Bucharest's historical centre and the popular Lipscani Street with a choice of bars, restaurants and themed cafes. Piata Universitatii Metro Station is a 2-minute walk away and the Railway Station is 10 minutes on foot from the Novotel. Shuttle services to Henri Coanda International Airport are organised on request.
Hotel Duquesne Eiffel is just a 2-minute walk from Ecole Militaire Metro station, which provides direct access to the Champs-Elysees, Opera Garnier and Place de la Bastille.

Located in Berlin and with Topography of Terror reachable within 500 metres, Precise Tale Berlin Potsdamer Platz provides a garden, non-smoking rooms and a terrace. The property is around 1.3 km from Brandenburg Gate and 1.5 km from Reichstag. Certain units at the property include a balcony with a city view.

adresa: Via Toledo 368, piano III, 80134 Naples, Italy
detalii: Featuring a shared lounge, Relais Della Porta is located in Naples, a 9-minute walk from Maschio Angioino. This property is set a short distance from attractions such as San Carlo Theatre.
